Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package nmi for versions less than 1.8.11-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package nmi for versions less than 1.8.11-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nmi is earlier than 1.8.11-2, affected by CVE-2022-21698
